section.title: retail cash registers and Cash Registers
section.para: Cash Registers are used to process retail Sales, Quotes, or Returns. To access the list of Cash Registers, follow this path: Sales > Retail > Cash Registers. The following screen will appear:

Use Cash Register
The Cash Registers screen displays information on all existing Cash Registers, including Site, terminal name, active status, opened timestamp, and current balance. To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes Cash Registers screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Highlight a Cash Register and then select this button to open the Cash Register terminal and begin processing a Sale.
Highlight a Cash Register and then select this button to reach a read-only version of the use screen.
